column2: "Nyankopɔn ara na me kra ayɛ komm rohwɛ no: No hɔ na mo nkwagye fi ba."
"Ɔno nko nye mo botan na mo nkwagye: Ɔno nye m’abantsentsen
"Hom botu ahyɛ ɔbaakofo do ekodu dabɛn
"Dza wotu ho egyina ara nye dɛ wobosun no efi n’abɔsobea ahwe famu; Hɔn enyi gye atorsɛm ho: Wɔdze hɔn ano hyira

column3: yɛ komm hwɛ Nyankopɔn ara: Na m’enyidado fi no hɔ."

column2: "No nko ara nye mo botan na mo nkwagye: Ɔno nye m’abantsentsen: mirinnhihim."
"Mo nkwagye na m’enyimnyam wɔ Nyankopɔn nsamu; M’ahoɔdzen botan na mo guandɔbew wɔ Nyankopɔn mu."

column4: Hom nhue hom akoma ngu n’enyim: Nyankopɔn yɛ guandɔbew ma hɛn."
na nyimpa mbapɔmba yɛ atorfo: Wogu nsɛn mu a wohuan kɔ sor: Wɔyɛ har koraa sen ehubɔw."

column3: Na mma hom nnyɛ ahopɔw wɔ adzewia ho: Sɛ ahonyadze dɔɔ so a
column4: mma hom mmfa hom akoma nnto do."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn akasa prɛko; Mpɛn ebien na matse iyi; Dɛ tum yɛ Nyankopɔn dze:"

column4: na mbɔbɔrhu dzi wɔ wo: Na ɔwo na itua nyimpa biara kaw dɛ mbrɛ n’edwuma tse."
